app.title: AI Mirror: AI Photo & Video
app.description:
📸 AI Mirror is the ultimate AI-powered photo editor and video creator. Instantly transform your images and videos with dozens of AI filters and style transformations—turn snapshots into anime characters, game avatars, action figures, sketches, or any GPT‑4o trend in seconds. We have top‑tier old photo restoration technology that brings your cherished memories back to life by enhancing details and repairing scratches, fading, and damage, so your photos look as vivid as the day they were taken. Whether you're crafting viral TikTok clips, personalized avatars, or treasured family moments, AI Mirror delivers studio-quality results. Our signature Image-to-Video feature converts still photos into live photos and the latest AI-powered hugs. Plus, we release new filters and templates weekly to keep you ahead of trends on social medias like TikTok, X, Instagram, and Facebook. From interactive duo videos to the trending mermaid effect, we've got you covered!

🎨 AI Filter:
🌟 Cosplay Creator: Step into iconic roles with our dynamic AI filters—transform into a mischievous jester, a creepy skeleton, or a magical witch.
🧙 Anime Generator: Dive into anime worlds with our anime maker and animate photos into digital avatars. With our photo animator, you can explore a variety of styles including spirited wind, fairy princess, and sketch photo maker.
🎨 Cartoon Filters & Avatars: Use our cartoon photo editor to turn your photos into cartoons, such as superhero comics and cartoon figures. 
🤩 Figure Maker: Personalize your collectible figures in different styles

🎞️ AI Video: 
🔥 Trending AI Video Effect: Explore the hottest AI video effects from across social platforms.
🧙 Magic Live Photo: Bring still images to life! Our AI transforms still images into live photos, adding motion and emotion to your cherished memories. 
❤️ AI Hugging and Kissing: Upload two individual photos to create lifelike interactions, such as heartfelt hugs or tender kisses. Experience the magic of connecting moments through AI animation.
🖼️ Stylized Video: Reimagine your videos with stunning artistic styles. Apply unique filters to turn your footage into visually captivating, stylized creations.

🎨 AI Editor
🖌️ AI Magic Brush: Transform any area of your photo into stunning visuals with just a brush stroke.
🔍 AI Photo Enhancer: Enhance your photo quality, bringing clarity to every shot.
🚫 AI Removal: Remove everything you do not want in your photos.
💃 AI Dress-Up:  Upload a full-body photo of yourself, pair it with any clothing image you love, and watch as our cutting-edge AI instantly creates a realistic virtual try-on. 
🏞️ AI Background: Replace or redesign your photo background using either another image or just a text prompt. 
🕰️ Old Photo Restoration: Instantly repair scratches, sharpen details, and even colorize black-and-white photos.
💬 Chat Edit: The next evolution of Magic Brush. No more tapping or smudging, Chat Edit lets you edit images freely using natural language. Just type what you want, and our AI will instantly apply your edits, whether it's changing the background, adjusting facial features, adding objects, or transforming styles.

🧑‍🎨 AI Photo
Now you can generate a full set of high-quality AI portraits that look styled, polished, and studio-ready with our AI Photo Generator. From LinkedIn professional headshots, vacation outfits to streetshots, your creativity has no bounds.

🌍 Community & Inspiration:
💬 Join our Discord community and explore an extensive array of styles and themes. Stay with AI Mirror's regular updates and discover why it's the best AI App for photo and video editing, making fun easy.
👥 Passionate about creativity and AI? Become an official ambassador to earn rewards and share the excitement!

🔗 Stay Connected:
Instagram: @aimirror.official
Discord: AI Mirror
Privacy Policy: https://aimirror.fun/policy
Terms of use: https://aimirror.fun/terms_of_service

app.summary: Anime AI Filter, Hugs & AI Dance Video, Cartoon Character & Photo Editor

reviews.text: Excellent quality AI generations. VERY frustrating the the free version only allows me to generate one image. Every attempt to make a new image after is interrupted by an ad trying to get me to pay for a subscription, and I have to reload the whole app to try again. I get limiting the models and number of generations at a time, but this is ridiculous. EDIT: Had to drop my rating to one star. Now the ads interrupt on the FIRST try. The app has become unusable.
reviews.replyText: We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the ads in our app. We will try to resolve the issue as soon as possible. Please allow us a little more time to complete our investigation, and we will provide you with an update as soon as possible. If you like our improvements, please consider giving us a 5-star rating. 😊

reviews.text: I signed up for the three day free trial but got charged for a year subscription instantly. I paid 1.99 for the mirror affect one use. I tried, but the process failed. When I went to retry, it tried to charge me again. I was charged with a subscription when I was supposed to have three days free and I got charged for an affect that failed on their end and then ripped me off my money for no result while trying to make me pay for more. To anyone considering it, just dont.
reviews.replyText:
Dear User,
We apologize for this experience. We would need to speak with you to better understand the problem you encountered. Please contact us at aimirror-support@polyversestudio.com so we can help resolve this issue. Thank you.

reviews.text: Used it nearly daily for a good 2 years or so. This recent update with ads that take forever to close, and the push for a subscription is insane. I understand money needs to be made, but im sure you can make enough with ads alone, placing them strategically while the creation loads and let us cancel out after a set amount of time. Place ads in the home screen where people spend the majority of their time choosing the options. Dont ruin a great app that I enjoyed with unnecessary subscriptions
reviews.replyText: Dear User, we are sorry for the inconvenience. We want to give you better user experience. Could you give us the screenshots of Ads that disturb you most? You can email us at aimirror-support@polyversestudio.com.

reviews.text: I give this app 5 stars because I love how my pictures turn out in the end! I love the options of choosing your scale (Quality/Version of drawing). My only downfall is I don't like that you have to pay for a membership and I can't do free trials because I have once and I have had been run ins with them. I love the app other than that little thing.. I can't wait for more updates with other fun new styles!! Keep up the great work!!
reviews.replyText: Thanks for your love and support on AI Mirror! We're happy that you enjoy the app and its features. We'll keep enhancing AI Mirror and updating NEW AI ART styles weekly. Thank you for choosing AI Mirror and stay tuned for more exciting updates and surprises! 😊

reviews.text: Ad on each use, but it's not horrible. Results are decent, and you can adjust how much it'll differ. Though it does generate in low resolutions, it's nothing extreme. However, style-generated images have a watermark without subscription, and AI replace has a filter that is very sensitive and may trip at seemingly innocent words. The AI erase feature acts as soon as you let go of the screen when it really should let you confirm when you want it to. Doesn't let you download past images generated.

Unusable in it's free version. I was able to generate 4 images after downloading while watching ads. Now I can "generate" an image but can't view or download it without upgrading. I don't even have an option to view ads to get free generations, but am still forced to watch an ad after generating and declining to sign up without even getting the ai image so this app is now a waste of time for me. Barely even able to test it to see if it was worth the premium version so won't be buying it.
reviews.replyText: We apologize for any inconvenience our app may cause. AI Mirror offers the Free Trail.To ensure you have the best experience possible, please download the latest version from the store. We've fixed this issue. If that doesn’t help, please contact us at aimirror-support@polyversestudio.com.

reviews.text: I don't usually give out reviews but future buyers need to know. I've had a sub since the dawn of this app and over the course the filters worked just fine with the occasionally phantom limb. Now images look worse then ever. It's a shame whatever they deemed as 'inappropriate' killed the uniqueness of each generation, but now eyes are off, unless you select HD the image looks like it had dirt rubbed on it, and even then it looks gross. Disappointing updates that take away features. Not worth.
reviews.replyText: We are actively working to resolve them and improve the filter's performance. Your feedback is invaluable to us, and we appreciate your patience as we work to address these concerns.

reviews.text: The app is super cool, I have made many anime style pictures from the app. I do wish the free version was better. Also, there is a technical issues that is preventing my photos to work - - I have disconnect my home wifi, and use my mobile network to process the picture. Hopefully this will get fixed soon. But overall, the app is cool, and hopefully they'll make the free version better by reducing the ads. 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟
reviews.replyText: We apologize for any inconvenience our app may cause.We understand that too many ads can be frustrating and we strive to maintain a balance that is appropriate.Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us, and if you enjoy this app, please consider giving us a 5-star rating. 😊

reviews.text: I really want to love this app because the three pictures it's given me are perfect. However I keep getting popups demanding I pay for a subscription and this is supposed to have a handful of free filters. I can't use it at all without paying. Will change star review if this is fixed because the quality of the output is very, very good
reviews.replyText: Dear user, I would like to sincerely apologize for the bad experience you had with our product. Please allow me to explain that your situation happened in a crowded queue, and AI Mirror offers free content where you can have fun creating AI photos with free filters. . If you like our improvements, please consider giving us a 5-star rating. 😊

reviews.text: They constantly bombard you with ads and have popups that try to get you buy premium. If you exit out of one pop up another one pops up in its place and you have to x out of a number of them before it lets you continue. But now almost all the filters are premium only, and the few free filters only will let you view one result and requires premium to view all 4 generated images, and every use after the first seems to require an ad viewing... or buying premium. Not worth using anymore.

app.developerLegalAddress: 228 Park Ave S, New York, NY 10003, United States
app.AIReview:
AI Mirror: AI Photo & Video Review – A Mixed Bag of Potential

Overview

AI Mirror: AI Photo & Video has garnered significant attention within the photography and creative app space, boasting over 13.7 million installs and a solid 4.13 rating. The app’s core proposition is straightforward: leverage artificial intelligence to transform user-uploaded photos and videos into a diverse range of styles – from anime characters and game avatars to classic artistic representations and even replicating trending GPT-4o effects. The free price point is undoubtedly a major draw, making it accessible to a broad audience. However, the sheer volume of features and the reliance on AI processing raise questions about performance, quality consistency, and ultimately, whether the app truly delivers on its ambitious promises.

Key Features

This application packs in a substantial number of functionalities centered around AI-driven transformation. Notable features include:

  • AI Filters & Style Transformations: This is the app’s central offering, encompassing dozens of pre-built filters categorized by style – Anime, Cartoon, Sketch, Action Figure, Game Avatar, and even specific trends like GPT-4o effects. Users can directly apply these styles to their photos or videos with a single tap.
  • Old Photo Restoration: A significant selling point is the "top-tier" old photo restoration technology. It promises to enhance details, repair scratches, fading, and other damage in older images, attempting to bring them back to their original vibrancy.
  • Hugs & AI Dance Video Generator: A surprisingly prominent feature allowing users to create short videos of themselves seemingly "hugging" a generated AI avatar or engaging in stylized dance sequences – leveraging AI for animation and movement.
  • Basic Photo Editor Tools: Beyond the AI transformations, the app offers basic editing tools like cropping, brightness/contrast adjustment, saturation control, and sharpness enhancement.
  • Video Creation Tools: Users can combine multiple photos into videos with customizable transitions and background music options (though premium features likely unlock more extensive video creation capabilities).

Strengths

Several aspects of AI Mirror contribute to its popularity:

  • Accessibility & Free Price Point: The app's free availability is a significant advantage, removing the barrier to entry for users experimenting with AI-powered photo and video editing.
  • Novelty & Trend Following: The app capitalizes on current trends – particularly anime aesthetics and GPT-4o style – which are highly engaging and appeal to younger demographics. The “Hugs” feature is a clever, shareable novelty.
  • Ease of Use: The interface is relatively intuitive; applying filters and styles is straightforward with minimal technical expertise required. The one-tap application process for many transformations simplifies the creative workflow.
  • Impressive Restoration Capabilities (Potential): While requiring careful testing, the old photo restoration feature does show promise in certain cases, effectively reducing noise and enhancing details on severely degraded images – though results vary greatly.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, AI Mirror has considerable areas needing attention:

  • Consistency of Results: A recurring complaint among users is inconsistent output quality across different filters and image types. Some transformations are remarkably effective, while others appear blurry, distorted, or simply don’t translate well.
  • Performance & Processing Time: Applying AI filters can be slow, particularly on lower-end devices. The processing time often exceeds 30 seconds for even simple transformations, leading to a frustrating user experience. Optimizing the backend is crucial.
  • Limited Control Over Transformations: Users have limited control over parameters within each filter. Fine-tuning adjustments are lacking, restricting creative flexibility beyond simply choosing a preset.
  • Watermark (Potentially): The app's description doesn’t explicitly state it uses watermarks for free users. If this is the case, it would be a significant negative impacting user satisfaction and potentially driving them towards paid subscriptions.
  • Reliance on Internet Connection: Almost all AI processing requires an active internet connection, making offline usage impossible.

User Experience

The app’s user interface is clean and modern, utilizing a predominantly dark theme which contributes to its appeal. The navigation is relatively straightforward, with filters categorized for easy browsing. However, the sheer number of options can feel overwhelming at first. Tutorials are minimal, leaving new users to largely experiment on their own – which can be both exciting and frustrating. The speed of transformations directly impacts the overall UX; slow processing times detract significantly from the user experience.

Value for Money

As a free app, AI Mirror offers a basic level of functionality that’s enjoyable for casual experimentation. However, given the performance issues and inconsistent results, it doesn't represent excellent value. The premium subscription model (details currently unclear) likely unlocks faster processing speeds, expanded filter options, and potentially removes watermarks – which would significantly increase its perceived value.

Conclusion

AI Mirror: AI Photo & Video presents a compelling concept with impressive potential. Its success hinges on resolving the key issues of inconsistent results, slow performance, and limited user control. While the novelty factor and free price point attract users, sustained engagement relies on delivering consistently high-quality transformations and a smoother, more responsive experience. Until these fundamental problems are addressed, AI Mirror remains a promising but ultimately flawed tool for anyone seeking to effortlessly transform their photos and videos with AI – it’s an interesting experiment, but not yet a polished solution. A significant update addressing performance and filter refinement would undoubtedly elevate this app from a fleeting trend to a truly valuable creative resource.
